title: Tutorial 'Plugins 101' version change broken (and possibly many others..)

content.raw:
When changing the version of the tutorial 'plugins 101' the website gets broken.

**The .md files** that should load **are working**:

#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/src/dea7b9a96b91/plugins_hello_world/?at=default

just **the version change goes somewhere wrong**.

without change:

* http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=install&tut=plugins_hello_world

with version change:

* http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=install&tut=plugins_hello_world&ver=1.9+
* http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=install&tut=plugins_hello_world&ver=6+

**Its not a browser problem**, tested in Edge, IE, Firefox, Chrome - in every browser the same broken behavior.

**Thanks for fixing and creating this great tutorials!**



**PS**: beside that I noticed many tutorials have problems when switching the version and then switching back

not working:

* http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=install&tut=screenshot
* http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=write_plugin&tut=plugins_world
* http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=write_plugin&tut=plugins_world_properties
* http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=write_plugin&tut=system_plugin
* http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=sensors&tut=sensor_noise

(didn't click through all, that's just random hits..)

working (which verifies its not the system its again some linking?)

* http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=install&tut=install_from_source
* http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=sensors&tut=contact_sensor

PPS: Thanks again!
content.html:
When changing the version of the tutorial 'plugins 101' the website gets broken.

The .md files that should load are working:

#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/src/dea7b9a96b91/plugins_hello_world/?at=default

just the version change goes somewhere wrong.

without change:

  • http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=install&tut=plugins_hello_world

with version change:

  • http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=install&tut=plugins_hello_world&ver=1.9+
  • http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=install&tut=plugins_hello_world&ver=6+

Its not a browser problem, tested in Edge, IE, Firefox, Chrome - in every browser the same broken behavior.

Thanks for fixing and creating this great tutorials!

PS: beside that I noticed many tutorials have problems when switching the version and then switching back

not working:

  • http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=install&tut=screenshot
  • http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=write_plugin&tut=plugins_world
  • http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=write_plugin&tut=plugins_world_properties
  • http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=write_plugin&tut=system_plugin
  • http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=sensors&tut=sensor_noise

(didn't click through all, that's just random hits..)

working (which verifies its not the system its again some linking?)

  • http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=install&tut=install_from_source
  • http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=sensors&tut=contact_sensor

PPS: Thanks again!
